metadata.description: Professional AI/ML, Python engineering, web backend, DevOps, game development, security, documentation, and UX skills for Claude Code - 24 complete skillpacks with 165+ TDD-validated skills

plugins.name: axiom-python-engineering
plugins.description: Modern Python 3.12+ engineering: types, testing, async, scientific computing, ML workflows - 10 skills

plugins.name: axiom-system-archaeologist
plugins.description: Deep codebase architecture analysis (4 commands, 2 agents) - C4 diagrams, subsystem catalogs, security surface mapping, test infrastructure analysis, dependency visualization, incremental delta analysis, cross-pack specialist integration

plugins.name: axiom-system-architect
plugins.description: TDD-validated architectural assessment enforcing professional discipline - prevents diplomatic softening, analysis paralysis, and security priority compromise - 3 specialist skills + router

plugins.name: axiom-web-backend
plugins.description: Web backend development expertise across FastAPI, Django, Express, REST/GraphQL APIs, microservices, and production deployment patterns - router + specialist skills for modern web APIs

plugins.name: axiom-devops-engineering
plugins.description: DevOps and deployment automation expertise - CI/CD pipeline architecture, deployment strategies, zero-downtime deployments, and infrastructure reliability patterns - TDD-validated with RED-GREEN-REFACTOR testing

plugins.name: axiom-engineering-foundations
plugins.description: Universal software engineering methodology - systematic debugging, safe refactoring, code review, incident response, technical debt triage, codebase confidence building - 6 language-agnostic skills

plugins.name: bravos-simulation-tactics
plugins.description: Game simulation implementation patterns and tactics - 11 skills

plugins.name: bravos-systems-as-experience
plugins.description: Emergent gameplay and systemic game design - 9 skills

plugins.name: lyra-ux-designer
plugins.description: UX design fundamentals - visual design, accessibility, interaction patterns - 11 skills

plugins.name: meta-skillpack-maintenance
plugins.description: Systematic maintenance and enhancement of skill packs through investigative domain analysis, RED-GREEN-REFACTOR testing, and automated quality improvements

plugins.name: meta-sme-protocol
plugins.description: SME (Subject Matter Expert) Agent Protocol - mandatory protocol for all specialist agents defining fact-finding, output contracts, and confidence/risk assessment

plugins.name: muna-technical-writer
plugins.description: Documentation structure, clarity, security-aware docs - 9 technical writing skills

plugins.name: ordis-quality-engineering
plugins.description: E2E testing, performance testing, chaos engineering, test automation - 21 quality engineering skills

plugins.name: ordis-security-architect
plugins.description: Threat modeling, security controls, compliance, ATO - 9 comprehensive security skills

plugins.name: yzmir-ai-engineering-expert

plugins.name: yzmir-deep-rl
plugins.description: Reinforcement learning - DQN, PPO, SAC, reward shaping, exploration - 13 skills

plugins.name: yzmir-dynamic-architectures
plugins.description: Dynamic/morphogenetic neural networks - grow, prune, adapt topology during training. Continual learning, gradient isolation, modular composition, lifecycle orchestration - 6 skills, 1 agent, 2 commands

plugins.name: yzmir-llm-specialist
